definition: Longhua, name of numerous entities, notably Longhua Temple 龍華寺|龙华寺 in Shanghai and Longhua District of Haikou City 海口市[Hai3 kou3 Shi4], Hainan

sentences.english: His relief sculpture in Shanghai Long Hua Martyrs' Cemetery can prove it.
sentences.chinese: 上海龙华烈士陵园中他的浮雕可引以为证。

sentences.english: The factory address is located in Long Huahe the back industrial district, has the staff more than 200 people.
sentences.chinese: 工厂地址设在龙华河背工业区，拥有员工200多人。

sentences.english: Two, Longhua is place where bank cards and codes can be easily lost.
sentences.chinese: 第二，龙华是一个非常容易丢卡和忘记密码的地方。

sentences.english: Millions of heroes list the last championship, longhua Cheng Feng.
sentences.chinese: 百万英雄榜最后的冠军赛，龙华对战程枫。

sentences.english: She lives in an apartment outside the factory with her boyfriend, who also works at Longhua.
sentences.chinese: 她与男友住在厂外的一间小公寓，男友也在龙华上班。

sentences.english: Cattle mouth Longhua Reservoir in Bao'an District of Shenzhen city near the second reformatory.
sentences.chinese: 牛嘴水库位于宝安区龙华深圳市第二劳教所附近。

sentences.english: Gou says he's proud of what he's accomplished at Longhua.
sentences.chinese: 郭台铭说他为自己在龙华的成就感到自豪。
